definition: fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure

sentences.english: The application of phosphate fertilizer in green manure production is the important technique measure for raising its fresh grass yield.
sentences.chinese: 增施磷肥是增加綠肥鮮草產量的一項重要技術措施。

sentences.english: The nursery should open fertilizer sources, manure and planting perennial green manure.
sentences.chinese: 苗圃要廣開肥源，常年積肥和種植綠肥。

sentences.english: A green manure is a crop grown mainly to improve soil fertility.
sentences.chinese: 種植綠肥作物主要是爲使土壤更加肥沃。

sentences.english: This is a continuation of the study of the nitrogen availability index of green manure in rice pot experiment.
sentences.chinese: 本文是水稻盆鉢試驗研究綠肥氮的有效度指標的繼續。

definition: (bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
red flowers and green willow/all the colors of spring
fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
lit. a white cloud transforms into what looks like a gray dog (idiom)/fig. the unpredictable changeability of the world
